Class PokojeService

java.lang.Object
com.project.springbootjavafx.services.AbstractServices<Pokoje,Integer>
com.project.springbootjavafx.services.PokojeService
@Service public class PokojeService extends AbstractServices<Pokoje,Integer>
The PokojeService class provides service methods for managing room entities (represented by the Pokoje class) in the application.

This service extends AbstractServices to inherit common CRUD operations and adds domain-specific functionality related to rooms. It provides methods to retrieve rooms associated with a given trip, rooms that have an associated hotel list, update the hotel list flag for rooms, as well as retrieve related hotel list and client information for a room.

See Also:

    • setListaHoteliTrue

      public void setListaHoteliTrue(List<Pokoje> pokoje)
      Sets the flag indicating that rooms have an associated hotel list to true.

      This method iterates over the provided list of rooms and updates each room's flag by calling PokojeRepository.updateListaHoteliTrue(Integer).

      Parameters:
      pokoje - the list of Pokoje entities to update

    • setListaHoteliFalse

      public void setListaHoteliFalse(List<Pokoje> pokoje)
      Sets the flag indicating that rooms have an associated hotel list to false.

      This method iterates over the provided list of rooms and updates each room's flag by calling PokojeRepository.updateListaHoteliFalse(Integer).

      Parameters:
      pokoje - the list of Pokoje entities to update
